actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: A bill to establish an age limit for participation in the school lunch program.

summary.text: Declares that no child 19 years of age or older shall be eligible for a free or reduced price lunch, unless such child is a bonafide, full-time student at a school providing such lunches.

titles.title: A bill to establish an age limit for participation in the school lunch program.
